title: IRONMAN World Championship says aloha St. George, bye bye Hawaii
content:
The 2021 IRONMAN World Championship has been postponedâ€¦and moved out of Hawaii. Citing COVID-related health and travel restrictions, the deferred race will now take place in St. George, Utah, on May 7, 2022. It will be the first time the event will run outside of Hawaii since its inception in 1978. The move is temporary,

The post IRONMAN World Championship says aloha St. George, bye bye Hawaii appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jilli Cluff
